channel.title: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?
channel.description:
I can only find servers for moparscape that give you tons of items and boost your levels super high. I'd like to find a server where there are no hacks. Just legitimiate and normal gameplay. And possibly retro gameplay (like pre-HD graphics)?
Any suggestions?

item.title: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Doesn’t exist, start programming buddy.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?

item.title: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

With the vast majority of these hosts/“creators” being kids who want to get ahead quick, meaning fast level up and such because it was too slow for them in real Runescape, good luck finding one with no commands like that.

Although there is one I used to play all the time that wasn’t from the mopar client until it was shut down, but is back up now. Its called unscape. One of the better servers I’ve played on, and the xp rates aren’t ridiculously fast like they are in most other servers, they are actually decently low.

Its been re-written, and is in BETA right now, so I’m not sure if you’ll enjoy it or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?

item.title: Where can I find hack-free moparscape servers?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“twovipers13, post:2, topic:402412”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=499468.msg3652937#msg3652937 date=1309844148]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
[/quote]

Yeah… what exactly is that supposed to do for me? I realize that’s the entire list but which of those are hack-free?[/quote]
Technically there is nothing Hack-free, anything can be hacked.
I think you mean more of an economic server where it is hard to get stats? Just look for one without PVP in the name.

Read full topic
